name: SurrealSkinu2122 Talc-Free Soft Blur Setting Powder
about: What it is:A talc-free, pro-performance loose powder that sets makeup up to 12hrs, blurs & smoothes the complexion with a natural finish & all-day shine control..Coverage:Light.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Loose Powder.Highlighted Ingredients:-Light-Diffusing Spherical Powders  & Smoothing Amino Acid: help blur lines and pores.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It  is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Mario curated this weightless powder with enhancing and brightening tones to build in soft layers for his signature SoftSetu2122 look. The powder controls shine without making skin look or feel dry for a blurred, natural finish. It is non-comedogenic & non-cakey without photo flashback..Clinical Results:In a consumer-panel study of 30 participants:
ingredients: -Light-Diffusing Spherical Powders and Smoothing Amino Acid: Visibly blur lines and pores..-Kaolin: Provides all-day shine absorption..-Squalane: Nourishes skin...Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, Kaolin, Magnesium Myristate, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Squalane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Puff application:.-Fold and rub powder into Master Pro Puff (sold separately), then press and roll into skin for a more concentrated SoftSetu2122 look..-Use tapered corner for precise application under your eyes and in small parts of your face...Brush application:.-Use the F2 Brush (sold separately) to lightly dust powder all over your face..-Use the F3 Brush (sold separately) to set under-eyes, for a softer, diffused effect...Pro tips:.-The formula allows for layering over creams and powders alike, which is integral to Mariou2019s technique. Layer Soft Pop Plumping Blush Veil or Soft Pop Blush Stick (each sold separately) over powder to add a pop of color to your SoftSetu2122 look..-For a softly brightening effect, try one of the following shades: 1 Fair Pink, 3 Neutral Peach, 4 Warm Honey, or 4.5 Medium Dark Honey..-Top off your look with Mariou2019s SurrealSkinu2122 Soft Setting Spray (sold separately) for a pro-performance set with a natural, lived-in finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great powder if you like something with a natural finish. It's not the most blurring powder I've tried, but it gives an imperceptible look that I really like, meaning it will set and matify, without giving you that obvious powdery makeup look.  The one draw back that really frustrates me is the packaging. The fact that there is no system to close the sifter so that whenever I close the lid the powder does not come out, makes this really messy.  I keep my makeup in a makeup bag, so my powder does not stay upright. So whenever I open up the powder, there is already a whole bunch that has come out, and it flies everywhere when I try to get some on my brush or on the cap.At this price point (and this goes for many other loose powders) , I should be able to have a lock system to keep the powder inside the container and only shake out as much as I need. On the picture, I had taken out the powder from my bag and opened directly, without shaking it or moving it harshly, and that's how much powder was already out. Even for travelling purposes, this would be really inconvenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but I struggle with dehydration in the dry winter months. I needed a setting powder that would not just set my makeup and help control my oils, but would also be lightweight and not dry me out. This powder by Mario absolutely has worked for me and checks what I was looking for. The Neutral Peach color is a true neutral shade that offers light pigment but is translucent enough that it does not alter the color of my foundation or leave a white cast. For being Talc-free, this powder does a great job at setting my makeup. I find I do not have to touch up later in the day and even if my oils peak through, my foundation stays in tact. I love the natural finish; it has body but feels lightweight, and does not feel dusty, crusty, or cakey. I also appreciate that the sift cap is easy to remove. So when traveling, if powder collects in the sifter, I can remove it and carefully dump it back into the jar without it getting messy. I will continue to repurchase as long as this stays in the line. I hope Mario never pulls a Givenchy.

The packaging is marios traditional  basic but chic not heavy a good size and easy to carry i would say what i love the most about this is it works wonders for creating the pore blurr effect and for doing the no make up looks ! Also the price range is very much affordable in my opinion

reviews.review_title: the perfect powder for anyone & everyone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this powder is everything i want in a powder, but i didnu2019t expect any less from Mario. it is so smoothing, does not LOOK powdery, VERY blurring (i even apply this on days im not wearing makeup to blur my pores), does not accentuate my dry patches (HUGE win). it sets my makeup perfectly and makes it last so much longer. the biggest win is that it does not make my foundation look orange like other powders (like the laura mercier). i am shocked that this has no talc. i have never considered using a talc free loose setting powder because talc is a big part of what makes powders effective and cosmetically elegant. this powder has definitely changed my mind on that though.  i am very pale, so pale that most brands donu2019t make shades light enough for me, and the only other powder iu2019ve used that doesnu2019t darken my makeup is huda beautyu2019s powder in shade sugar cookie. i actually like this powder more than my previous all-time favorite powder (hudau2019s) because it is more lightweight but u201cheavyu201d enough to blur, smooth, and make my makeup last.   it makes my face feel much less dry than any other loose powder; i use less hydrating setting spray with this because when i finish my makeup itu2019s much less powdery and dry than usual, so i need less mist to melt that powdery finish. i use tretinoin which my skin has literally never adjusted to (iu2019ve used it for 1+ year), so my skin is always mildly flaky because tret makes your skin basically shed a lot. this makes base makeup very difficult at times. this powder smooths out the dry patches rather than make them look worse. unlike most powders. it doesnu2019t dry my skin to the point that my face looks more and more dry as the day goes on.  this powder also works beautifully over no makeup, light makeup, and full glam, making it very versatile. it applied beautifully with a puff or brush, and looks great if you apply a light or heavy amount.   it controls oil very well for the average personu2019s dry-oily skin without being drying and excessive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous product but absolutely horrendous packaging. The product itself is great; a little goes a long way. This powder paired with Huda's blurring primer will definitely keep your tzone in check.   This definitely works better than the CT pressed powder. It doesn't make your skin feel dry or look cakey. My undereye still does crease a little bit, but that isn't something that bothers me since that area is prone to creasing anyways. The powder doesn't irritate my eyes either.  They really need to sort out the packaging, because the powder plumes everywhere due to how finely milled it is. And it is an asthmatic's nightmare. I keep it upright on my nightstand to help it settle a bit, but they really need to sort it out by adding a mesh or something to keep the powder contained. This powder definitely isn't travel friendly. I am trying to find a solution to decanting it into something that won't get the powder everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Makeup by Mario in exchange for my honest opinion. Makeup by Mario's Surrealskin Soft Blur Setting Powder came at the most perfect time. I had been searching for a setting powder that was easy to go on, one that left me looking matte but not powdery or cakey, and one that was a great shade match for me; and I found that and more with this product. I received shade number 5 - Neutral Medium Deep and the texture seems to be velvety and smooth, making  buildable in case I was darker or lighter, which makes it easy to match and work with. I especially love that it doesn't leave me ashy, just as many other setting powders do. It leaves my skin feeling light, as if I don't have makeup on. With this powder, I go all day without getting shiny or greasy. For the oily girls and guys, this powder will change your life. For the dry girls and guys, this won't leave you feeling tight. I've used this powder multiple days and with multiple variations of makeup bases and looks, and this powder doesn't change. You get exactly what you pay for. There is no scent, so if you're sensitive, this is a great resource for you. Also, the packaging is simple, uncomplicated, and works great to help you keep from easily losing product, especially if you drop it. I plan to use every drop of this product, buy again when out, and would recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Makeup by Mario in exchange for my honest review.  I got the Makeup by Mario Surreal Skin Soft Blur Setting Powder in shade 2-Neutral Light. I love that this uses ingredients that are beneficial for my skin! It is talc-free and non-comedogenic which is another huge plus for me! I felt like there was a little shine throughout the day, but the light diffusing powder may factor into that. I have combination skin and I would have liked for this to have stronger oil control. It definitely doesnu2019t make my skin look dry or dull. It is buildable, but I noticed it creasing some. The price point is very reasonable and usually a little goes a long way with loose powder, so it should last a while before running out.  I personally donu2019t think this would be as long lasting for oily/very oily skin types. I donu2019t know if I will buy this myself, but I will continue to use it and see how it does with my skin. If you are a fan of Makeup by Mario or loose setting powder, it might be worth giving it a try!
